query: 如图,PA、PB分别与⊙O相切于A、B两点,C是⊙O上一点,且C点在AB所在直线的右侧,若∠P=36°,则∠ACB=()选项：['54°', '72°', '108°', '144°']
answer: 解:连接OA、OB,∵PA、PB分别与⊙O相切于A、B两点,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,∴∠OAP=∠OBP=90°,∴∠AOB=180°-∠P=180°-36°=144°,∴∠ACB=p<(≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{f})<(√{2})c⊥|➝{ZX}|^{c}∠AOB=p<(≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{f})<(√{2})c⊥|➝{ZX}|^{c}×144°=72°．故选:B．
